|brand = TRENDnet |model = TEG-082WS |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V2.1R |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/14/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/TRENDnet_TEG-082WS_V2.1R |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = 3C:8C:F8,
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8380M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 4KEc |cpu1spd = 500 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635F; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M8IN-D1; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|lan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = smart
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Serial GPIO/LED Display Controller;Realtek;RTL8231;;1;,,, 3A, 23V Step-Down Converter;M3Tek;IT76630M;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Diodes Incorporated;AZ1117;;1;,,, 30V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4803;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input AND Gate;NXP;74LVC08A;;1;,,, 8-Bit Parallel-Out Serial Shift Register;TI;SN74HC164;;3;,,, |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = 9SIAJ7W8H38454 |upc = 710931140071 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B00PDSL3GO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded [[MIPS 4KEc]] @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 256MB RAM (DDR3L) *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *2x Gigabit SFP Slots *20Gbps switching capacity
==Links of Interest== *[https://svanheule.net/switches/teg-082ws#trendnet_teg-082ws_v21r ''Trendnet TEG-082WS V2.1R'' on '''svanheule''' wiki]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:TEG-082WS v2 d01 2-(mirror).png| File:TEG-082WS v2 d03 2-(back).png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Trendnet-teg-082ws-pcb-top.jpg| File:Trendnet-teg-082ws-internal.jpeg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
==See also== :[[TRENDnet TEG-082WS V1.0R]] use [[Marvell]] Feroceon Core (ARM).
GPL Firmware (for V2.0R version) contains reference to other models. :All of these switches use [[Realtek]] chipsets: * TEG-082WS • TPE-082WS * TEG-204WS * TEG-284WS • TPE-2840WS * TEG-524WS • TPE-5240WS * TEG-S224 • [[TRENDnet TEG-S224 C2.0R]] ([[Realtek]]) * TPE-224WS • [[TRENDnet TPE-224WS C1.1R]] ([[Realtek]]) * TPE-1020WS • [[TRENDnet TPE-1020WS]] (V1.2R - [[Marvell]]) * TPE-1620WS • [[TRENDnet TPE-1620WS/A V2.0R]] ([[Realtek]]) * TPE-5028WS • TPE-5048WS
[[Category:English Documentation]]
